WPS DescribeProcess request handler¶

Class DescribeProcess¶

class pywps.Wps.DescribeProcess.DescribeProcess(wps, processes=None)¶

Parses input request obtained via HTTP POST encoding - should be XML file.

bboxValue(input, processInput)¶

Format bboxValue value attributes

Parameters:
  • inoutput – pywps.Process.InAndOutputs.Input or pywps.Process.InAndOutputs.Output
  • processInOutput – dictionary, where to store the parameters in
complexValue(inoutput, processInOutput)¶

Format complex value attributes, it also changes None format to application/x-empty

Parameters:
  • inoutput – pywps.Process.InAndOutputs.Input or pywps.Process.InAndOutputs.Output
  • processInOutput – dictionary, where to store the parameters in
literalValue(inoutput, processInOutput)¶

Format literal value attributes

Parameters:
  • inoutput – pywps.Process.InAndOutputs.Input or pywps.Process.InAndOutputs.Output
  • processInOutput – dictionary, where to store the parameters in
processInputs(process)¶

Format process inputs block

Returns:dictionary, which is to be used for pywps.Template.TemplateProcessor.set()
processOutputs(process)¶

Format process outputs block

Returns:dictionary, which is to be used for pywps.Template.TemplateProcessor.set()
processesDescription()¶

Format process description block

Returns:dictionary, which is to be used for pywps.Template.TemplateProcessor.set()
